statements: SELECT * FROM Customers
SELECT name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM Customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id >= 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' OR address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Customers WHERE payment_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT name, address, payment_details FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount < 500 ORDER BY o.total_amount;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_payment_method FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Completed' AND total_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.name, p.product_name, o.total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id LEFT JOIN products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000.00 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT customer_id, street_address, city, postal_code FROM addresses;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.product_name, o.total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id INNER JOIN products p ON o.customer_id = p.product_id;
SELECT a.customer_id, CONCAT(a.street_address, ', ', a.city, ', ', a.postal_code) AS full_address FROM addresses a;
